item.title: Inglot will be opening a new store in Singapore next month
item.description: Inglot, the cosmetics company, will open its doors in Singapore on October 1st. Source: Inglot Singapore Facebook page. The new store, located at Wisma Atria #B1-14, will host a grand opening on October 1st, according to Inglot Singapore’s Facebook page. On October 1st and 2nd, from 4-5 pm, Inglot makeup artist Ela Kocot will offer complimentary makeup demonstrations. Those interested in attending can register through the details provided on Inglot Singapore’s Facebook page.
